name: Mary Langway
text: I'm visiting from out of state and my sister recommended Marco's. We orders pizza and hot subs. DELICIOUS!!  They have the best hot Italian sub I've ever experienced.  We had it delivered.  The delivery lady arrived quickly, she was a ‚Ä¶More

name: animallover
text: Not the best pizza, I have tried. Staff is friendly. Driver are always on time and friendly. I love the greeting when you enter the resturant.

name: D. O'Neil
text: My family and I ordered pizzas from Marcos last week and had nothing but great things to say about them! We love that we can track the order the entire time and was blown away when the delivery guy came way sooner than expected! He was such ‚Ä¶More

name: Keith Kellam
text: It's interesting that the two other reviews sound like the place has been open for a long time.  They only opened 2 weeks ago, so not a lot of history here.  Sounds like they had some issues with their employment and are biased because of ‚Ä¶More

name: D Macko
text: This particular location can't seem to make the pizza correctly. I asked for well done L Works with no sausage and got the most undercooked pizza I've ever been given. Absolutely disgraceful. It seems intentional to under cook a pizza so much. RAW PEPPERONI.

name: Maria RivasCruz
text: For the third time we order Wings from this place and they are Fat wings gross! I asked them to Fry them crispy but never have got them right. I will order their pizza but never again wings.    #changeyourwingrecepie

name: Rob Knows
text: Another frozen pizza shop. Tried it twice but never again. I've had better frozen pizza's from the store for half the cost.

name: Mark Lanterman
text: Excellent food, prices, floor, & quality. Highly recommend  Marco's.

name: Tanya Silvey
text: I always used to get pizza from Papa John's but this place has them beat hands down. I just found my new favorite!!!!!

name: dallas dean
text: HI, I worked at Marco's pizza for a week until they Accused of taking 20 dollars in Pizza delivery change. I DID NOT TAKE THERE MONEY! and they have no proof, they just fired me because the register came up short and they needed to blame someone. And they still a month later  have not paid me my 2 week check.

name: Dawn Davis
text: They have the best pizza's and subs

name: Joseph Whitt

text: I like how someone who i dont even think has worked for a maros befor and had to deal with them is gonna coment on and experience someone else had. All i know is I got fired for talking bad about how they put me on break and do not treat me ‚Ä¶More

name: David W
text: Loved the pizza and the kids loved it even more

name: nash hamilton
text: Found a 7inch string in my crust and will never return as a customer or recommend them.if I could give them 0 stars I would
